org.jclouds.softlayer.reference
Interface SoftLayerConstants

public interface SoftLayerConstants

Configuration properties and constants used in SoftLayer connections.

Author:
Adrian Cole

Field Summary
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_CPU_REGEX
          pattern where last group matches core speed
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_DISK0_TYPE
          Default Boot Disk type (SAN, LOCAL)
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_LOGIN_DETAILS_DELAY
          number of milliseconds to wait for an order to arrive on the api.
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_PACKAGE_NAME
          Name of the product package corresponding to cloud servers
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_PORT_SPEED
          Uplink port speed for new guests (10, 100, 1000)
static String PROPERTY_SOFTLAYER_VIRTUALGUEST_PRICES
          standard prices for all new guests.
